title: Fuck It Up!
lyrics:
Lil' bitch really fuck it up (ay)
On her hand stand, doin' tricks fuck it up (hey, hey, hey)
If you ain't from the gang you get hit with these slug (gang)
Eight point stand lil' bitch fuck it up (gang, gang, gang)
On the gang, gang, gang, gang (ay)
Bitch do yo thang, thang, thang, thang (gang, gang, gang)

And yo bitch in the party gettin' hit by the whole damn gang, gang, gang, gang (OCHO)



You already know I like Resha (Resha), Keyshia rode round town with Tameka (Tameka)

'Cause she got ass like Sika (gang)

She just touch the dick, yeah, OCHO wanna keep her (gang, gang)

I don't even like that thot now, hot now (ay)

OCHO been the man up on this block now (OCHO)

Run up on me get shot down (ay)

Three point stand, lil' bitch throw it back now (throw it back)

Balls in her mouth she like that now (god damn)

Block on her heart like I'm Shaq now (block)

I don't give a fuck, I'm just mad now (gang)

Got me sellin' work out this trap now (god damn)

She a lil hottie, thottie (lil' thottie)

I was rollin' round in the new new Mazi (lil' vroom)

Yeah, she got a whole lot of body (gang)

Young fat nigga, I'm horny, I'm hyphy (ooh)

I be really trippin', trippin', trippin

On these scary ass niggas who be snitchin', snitchin', snitchin' (god damn)

Run up, get to clippin', clippin', clippin'

If I go across the tracks, I be trippin', trippin', trippin' (rrrah)

I be really ridin' with them Glocks out (gang)

All my hoodies ridin' with them chops out (gang, gang)

Watch a bitch fuck it up for Rich (Rich)

Now watch a bitch fuck it up for Lucky (Lil' Lucky)

All my young niggas they be thuggin' (damn)

Throw them B's up, we be bloodin' (gang, gang)

If I catch a nigga, we gon' slap him (bang)

Throw him in the bag, we gon' duff him

On Bloods, on Bloods, on Bloods, on Bloods

Bounty Hunter Watts, lil' bitch fuck it up (gang, gang)

Need a lil' thottie throw that ass, so what

Need a freak bitch to fuck the whole damn hood (lil' whore)



Lil' bitch really fuck it up (ay)

On her hand stand, doin' tricks fuck it up (hey, hey, hey)

If you ain't from the gang you get hit with these slug (gang)

Eight point stand lil' bitch fuck it up (gang, gang, gang)

On the gang, gang, gang, gang (ay)

Bitch do yo thang, thang, thang, thang (gang, gang, gang)

And yo bitch in the party gettin' hit by the whole damn gang, gang, gang, gang (gang)
